channel.title: Bootscreen (Dont know if this post should be here)
channel.description:
Hi, I'm new, also sorry if I say something wrong, because really i speak spanish. I've been watching in "media section" that there are wallpapers made by fans, so I made a bootscreen. If you want it, here is the link:
[url]https://www.megaupload.com/?d=V7L8J31U[/url]
I hope you all like it, and enjoy.
Happy Merry Christmas! :slight_smile:
Edit: Also, I forgot to mention, it can be installed with TuneUp Utilities 2008. [img]https://img134.imageshack.us/img134/5470/blackmesasourcebootscre.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: The_BuLeR
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

OP: Habla ingles muy bien, mas mejor que yo hablo espanol. Estaria bien aqui.

Muchas Gracias

geekofalltrades:

Also, unless I’m wrong, this is a Windows boot screen, not a boot screen for the mod.

Yes, it’s a bootscreen for Windows XP, it can be installed with TuneUp Utilities 2008

EDIT: Also, unless I’m wrong, this is a Windows boot screen, not a boot screen for the mod.

item.title: Bootscreen (Dont know if this post should be here)
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
Spell checking doesn’t always work. If the word is too far from other words, it wont’ catch.

Also, if English isn’t his native language than spell check might not be catching English words, but whatever the native language is.

Read full topic
item.source: Bootscreen (Dont know if this post should be here)

item.title: Bootscreen (Dont know if this post should be here)
item.dc:creator: saivert
item.description:
Funny how people who actually don’t write such bad English at all apologize the most.

edit: Also reminded me of the guy from Barcelona in Fawlty Towers. “I know nothing. I’m from Barcelona.” https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s6EaoPMANQM

Also there is spell checking in browsers these days. There really is no excuse.

Anyways, nice boot screen although the few times I do boot my computer doesn’t warrant me changing the default one.

Read full topic
